name: Dice Roll Delivery
description:
Dice Roll Delivery

Deliver dice shaped bread rolls to customers across the town in the fastest time possible! 

How to play:

  1. Drive with WASD / Arrow Keys / Mouse
  2. Drive to customers and memorize their order.
  3. Drive to the bakery and make the order.
  4. Deliver the order to the customer.

Music: Lobo Loco - Free Spacy Organ

For the GMTK Game Jam 2022
